feature_model.name: FM_ABE

meta.data: A tree like feature model for ABE

feature_model.feature_tree: :r Analogy Based Estimation(_r) :m Case Subset Selector(_r_1) :g (_r_1_2) [1,1] : Outlier(_r_1_2_3) : Prototype(_r_1_2_4) : Remove Nothing(_r_1_2_5) :o Feature Weighting Method(_r_6) :g (_r_6_7) [1,1] : Information Gain(_r_6_7_8) : Relief(_r_6_7_9) : Principal Components(_r_6_7_10) : Correlation-based Feature Selection(_r_6_7_11) : Consistency-Based Subset Evaluation(_r_6_7_12) : Wrapper Subset Evaluation(_r_6_7_13) : Feature Weighted ABE(_r_6_7_14) : Analogy-X(_r_6_7_15) :o Discretization Method(_r_17) :g (_r_17_18) [1,1] : Equal Frequency(_r_17_18_19) : Equal Width(_r_17_18_20) : Entropy(_r_17_18_21) : PKID(_r_17_18_22) : Remain Same(_r_17_18_23) :m Similarity Measure(_r_24) :g (_r_24_25) [1,1] : Weighted Euclidean(_r_24_25_26) : Unweighted Euclidean(_r_24_25_27) : Max Distance(_r_24_25_28) : Triangular Distribution(_r_24_25_29) : Minkowski(_r_24_25_30) : Mean of Ranking(_r_24_25_31) :m Adaption Mechanism(_r_32) :g (_r_32_35) [1,1] : Median(_r_32_35_36) : Weighted Mean(_r_32_35_37) : Unweighted Mean(_r_32_35_38) : Second Learner(_r_32_35_39) :m Analogy Selection(_r_40) :g (_r_40_41) [1,1] : Dynamic(_r_40_41_42) : Fixed(_r_40_41_43) :g (_r_40_41_43_44) [1,1] : Set K as 1(_r_40_41_43_44_45) : Set K as 2(_r_40_41_43_44_46) : Set K as 3(_r_40_41_43_44_47) : Set K as 4(_r_40_41_43_44_48) : Set K as 5(_r_40_41_43_44_49)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_6:~_r_6 or _r_17 constraint_4:~_r_6_7_9 or _r_17 constraint_2:~_r_1_2_3 or _r_24_25_27 constraint_3:~_r_6_7_8 or _r_17
